OUR REF: Invoice No. {{ doc.sales_order }} DT: {{ doc.get_formatted("delivery_date") }}
PRODUCT : {{ doc.product }}


We hereby guarantee that the above product comply in all respect to the Indian food laws i.e. Prevention of Food Adulteration Act (1954) and Fruit Products Order (1955) and all acts, amending or supplementing the same


We further certify and guarantee that the product is 100% natural and is not adulterated or misbranded within the meaning of aforementioned act.


This certificate shall also constitute a Continuing Guarantee of the matters started above.




For EXOTIC FRUITS PVT. LTD



AUTHORISED SIGNATORY
